body:
The original code called the `sysctl` command 10 times to get 5 pieces of information, but you can get the same stuff with only one external process launch.  Just call it once to reduce Spack startup time.

- [x] coalesce 5 calls to `sysctl` into one
- [x] memoize call to `raw_info_dict`
title: microarchitectures: only call sysctl once on macOS
